snippet: So much for the governor’s promise to fight corruption in Albany. He shut down the independent ethics commission before it had a chance to do its job.
abstract: Editorial criticizes New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo for shutting down the independent Moreland commission and reneging on his promise to fight corruption in state politics; contends package of reforms that was part of the negotiated budget deal does not come close to the large-scale reforms the state needs.
lead_paragraph: So much for the governor’s promise to fight corruption in Albany. He shut down the independent ethics commission before it had a chance to do its job.

headline.main: Mr. Cuomo’s Gift to the Cynics
headline.print_headline: Mr. Cuomo’s Gift to the Cynics

keywords.value: Moreland Commission to Investigate Public Corruption (NYS)
keywords.name: organizations
